section.title: State
section.para:
Sets, clears or toggles one of the 32 user defined states which are associated with each window. The state is a number ranging from 0 to 31. The states have no meaning in fvwm, but they can be checked in conditional commands like
with the State condition. The optional argument bool is a boolean argument. "True" sets the given state, while "False" clears it. Using "toggle" switches to the opposite state. If the bool argument is not given, the state is toggled.
